[Network Client]

A word API response, including alternative spelling suggestions if the word could not be found. More...

Detailed Description

A word API response, including alternative spelling suggestions if the word could not be found.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithWord: (WNWordObject *)  wordObject
spellingSuggestions: (NSArray *)  spellingSuggestions 

Initialize a new response instance with the provided word and spelling suggestions.

Parameters:
wordThe word record.
spellingSuggestionsAlternative spelling suggestions as an ordered array of WNSpellingSuggestion instances. Will be empty if alternative spelling suggestions were not requested.
+ (id) responseWithWord: (WNWordObject *)  wordObject
spellingSuggestions: (NSArray *)  spellingSuggestions 

Create and initialize a new response instance with the provided word and spelling suggestions.

Parameters:
wordThe word record.
spellingSuggestionsAlternative spelling suggestions as an ordered array of WNSpellingSuggestion instances. Will be empty if alternative spelling suggestions were not requested.

Property Documentation

- (NSArray*) spellingSuggestions [read, assign]

Alternative spelling suggestions as an ordered array of WNSpellingSuggestion instances.

Will be empty if alternative spelling suggestions were not requested.

- (WNWordObject*) wordObject [read, assign]

The returned word record.
